assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Mezzan Holding Company K.S.C.P., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, sells, and distributes food and non-food products in Kuwait, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Qatar, Jordan, Afghanistan, and Iraq. The company offers cakes, biscuits, potato chips, snacks, meats, water, canned foods, and dairy products; contract catering services to ministries, educational institutions, hotels, restaurants, shopping malls, health clubs, public works authorities, and onshore and offshore rigs; and food supply services for short term and long-term delivery of cooked food, as well as on site operation of food facilities and catering for one off events. It also provides repairs and maintenance services, as well as sells and delivers food. In addition, the company manufactures and distributes medicines, medical devices, and household products, as well as distributes health and beauty products. Further, it manufactures plastic materials and cartons; industrial lube oil; and recycles and trades in oil and lubricants. Additionally, the company is involved in the wholesale and retail trade of cosmetics, medicines, and other consumer items; wholesale and retail trade of foodstuff; manufacture of paper and nylon products; running restaurants; manufacture and wholesale distribution of meat products; general trading and contracting activities; and import and export of dairy products. It also manufactures and trades in household goods; trades in cleaning materials and insects protection products; manufactures and sells pastries and cakes; manufactures and distributes food and beverages; provides logistics, security, and storage services; and manufactures and trades in fresh fruits and vegetables. The company was founded in 1944 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
